author: Troy Alford
name: axis-wiki
description: Node.js Wiki, based on React w/ES6

scripts.build: rm -r ./build && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-js: npm run build-app-js && npm run build-dep-js
scripts.build-app-js: mkdirp build/js && browserify -x react -x react-dom -x react-router -x lodash source/application/Application.js > build/js/application.js
scripts.build-dep-js: mkdirp build/js && browserify -r react -r react-dom -r react-router -r lodash source/Dependencies.js > build/js/dependencies.js
scripts.build-css: npm run concat-css && mkdirp build/css && node-sass build/sass/application.scss -o build/css --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-embed
scripts.develop: npm run serve & npm run build-dep-js & npm run auto-rebuild-js & npm run auto-rebuild-css
